 20/***********************************************************************
 21  Declarations & Class Definitions
 22***********************************************************************/
 23
 24namespace vsip
 25{
 26
 27namespace impl
 28{
 29
 30
 31/// Class to iterate over values stored in a vector view.
 32
 33template <typename ViewT>
 34class Vector_iterator
 35{
 36public:
 37  typedef typename ViewT::value_type value_type;
 38
 39  Vector_iterator(ViewT view, index_type idx)
 40    : view_(view),
 41      idx_ (idx)
 42    {}
 43
 44  Vector_iterator(Vector_iterator const& rhs)
 45    : view_(rhs.view_),
 46      idx_ (rhs.idx_)
 47    {}
 48
 49  Vector_iterator& operator=(Vector_iterator const& rhs)
 50  {
 51    view_  = rhs.view_;
 52    idx_   = rhs.idx_;
 53    return *this;
 54  }
 55
 56  Vector_iterator& operator++()       { idx_ += 1;  return *this; }
 57  Vector_iterator& operator--()       { idx_ -= 1;  return *this; }
 58  Vector_iterator& operator+=(int dx) { idx_ += dx; return *this; }
 59  Vector_iterator& operator-=(int dx) { idx_ -= dx; return *this; }
 60
 61  Vector_iterator& operator++(int)
 62    { Vector_iterator tmp = *this; idx_ += 1; return tmp; }
 63  Vector_iterator& operator--(int)
 64    { Vector_iterator tmp = *this; idx_ -= 1; return tmp; }
 65
 66  bool operator==(Vector_iterator const& rhs) const
 67    { return &(view_.block()) == &(view_.block()) && idx_ == rhs.idx_; }
 68
 69  bool operator!=(Vector_iterator const& rhs) const
 70    { return &(view_.block()) != &(view_.block()) || idx_ != rhs.idx_; }
 71
 72  bool operator<(Vector_iterator const& rhs) const
 73    { return (idx_ < rhs.idx_); }
 74
 75  int operator-(Vector_iterator const& rhs) const
 76    { return (idx_ - rhs.idx_); }
 77
 78  Vector_iterator operator+(int dx) const
 79  {
 80    Vector_iterator res(view_, idx_);
 81    res += dx;
 82    return res;
 83  }
 84  Vector_iterator operator-(int dx) const
 85  {
 86    Vector_iterator res(view_, idx_);
 87    res -= dx;
 88    return res;
 89  }
 90  
 91  value_type operator*() const
 92    { return view_.get(idx_); }
 93
 94  // Member data.
 95private:
 96  ViewT         view_;
 97  index_type	idx_;
 98};
 99
100
101} // namespace vsip::impl
102} // namespace vsip
103
104#endif // VSIP_CORE_VECTOR_ITERATOR_HPP
